name: Silver Bottle

name: Silver Cup
effect: A popular option among hikers. It’s made with titanium, so it doesn’t rust even if it’s used to hold drinks with high sodium content.

name: Silver Nanab Berry
effect: Greatly calms a Pokémon in battle, in Let's Go Pikachu/Eevee.

name: Silver Pick

name: Silver Pinap Berry
effect: Greatly increases chance of getting items when a Pokémon is caught, in Pokémon Let's Go.

name: Silver Powder
effect: Increases the power of Bug-type moves.

name: Silver Razz Berry
effect: Makes a Pokémon easier to catch in Pokémon Let's Go.

name: Sitrus Berry
effect: If held by a Pokémon, it heals the user's HP a little.

name: Sky Plate
effect: Increases power of Flying-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Flying.

name: Slowbronite
effect: Enables Slowbro to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Slowpoke Cup
effect: A cup for big-time Pokémon fans. Kids will happily drink out of it, making it a boon to parents.

name: Smart Candy
effect: Increases a Pokémon's Special Attack stat by 1.

name: Smart Candy L
effect: Increases a Pokémon's Special Attack stat.

name: Smart Candy XL
effect: Increases a Pokémon's Special Attack stat.

name: Smiling Vee Pick
effect: A pick designed after Eevee, sporting the Pokémon’s smiling face. It’s easy to grab by the ears, which is part of why it’s so popular.

name: Smoke Ball
effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon without fail.

name: Smoked Fillet

name: Smooth Rock

effect: Raises Attack if hit by an Ice-type move.

name: Soothe Bell

name: Soul Dew

name: Soul Slate
effect: A slate overflowing with enigmatic energy. You can feel a strong connection between it and the Soul Room at Ramanas Park.

name: Spell Tag
effect: Increases the power of Ghost-type moves.

name: Spelon Berry
effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

name: Spicy Herba Mystica
effect: The legendary condiment said to have the mightiest of all spicy flavors. It’s said that a single bite will kick the metabolism into high gear immediately.

name: Splash Plate
effect: Increases power of Water-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Water.

name: Spooky Plate
effect: Increases power of Ghost-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Ghost.

name: Squall Slate
effect: A slate overflowing with enigmatic energy. You can feel a strong connection between it and the Squall Room at Ramanas Park.

name: Star Sweet
effect: Evolves Milcery into Star Flavor Alcremie.

name: Starf Berry
effect: Sharply raises a random stat when HP is low.

name: Steel Bottle (B)

name: Steel Bottle (R)
effect: A go-to bottle sometimes used while camping. The stainless steel keeps the temperature inside steady, making it great for keeping drinks hot or cold.

name: Steel Bottle (Y)
effect: A go-to bottle sometimes used while camping. The stainless steel keeps the temperature inside steady, making it great for keeping drinks hot or cold.

name: Steelixite

name: Stone Plate

effect: A slate overflowing with enigmatic energy. You can feel a strong connection between it and the Stratospheric Room at Ramanas Park.

effect: Restores 60 HP.

name: Swampertite
effect: Enables Swampert to Mega Evolve during battle.

name: Sweet Apple

effect: A slate overflowing with enigmatic energy. You can feel a strong connection between it and the Tectonic Room at Ramanas Park.

name: Venusaurite

name: Wacan Berry
effect: Weakens a supereffective Electric-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

effect: Increases the power of a Water-type move only once.

effect: Changes a Pokémon's Tera Type to .

effect: A dish for picnics. Comes in plenty of colors to choose from based on the food or the mood. The yellow variety is impossible to go wrong with.
